name: Dongtube Api'S
description: Simple and easy to use API documentation with AI, random images, and downloader endpoints.

items.name: LuminAI
items.desc: Advanced AI assistant powered by LuminAI for intelligent conversations

params.text: Text message for the AI to respond to

items.name: Blue Archive
items.desc: Get random high-quality Blue Archive character images

items.name: Random Cat
items.desc: Get a random cute cat image

items.name: Random Waifu
items.desc: Get a random waifu image

items.name: Random Neko
items.desc: Get a random neko (anime catgirl) image

items.name: Anime Quotes
items.desc: Get random inspirational anime quotes with character info

items.name: Upscale Image
items.desc: Upscale an image using PicsArt AI upscaler

params.url: URL of the image (optional if uploading file)

items.name: SaveFrom Downloader
items.desc: Download videos/audio/images using SaveFrom.net

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download images/videos from Pinterest pins

items.name: BRAT Generator
items.desc: Generate BRAT-style text images with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT image

items.name: BRAT Video Generator
items.desc: Generate animated BRAT-style text videos with customizable colors and backgrounds

params.text: Text to be inserted into the BRAT video

text: Text message for the AI to respond to (required)

items.name: Upscale Image (PicsArt AI)
items.desc: Enhance or upscale an image using PicsArt AI. Supports URL or file upload.

items.name: SaveFrom Downloader
items.desc: Download video, audio, or images from supported sites via SaveFrom.net.

params.type: Filter by type: video, audio, image (optional)

items.name: Pinterest Downloader
items.desc: Download media (image, video, gif) from Pinterest pins.
